title: Language Learning Design Utilizing Spatial Navigation

context.additional_context: Enhances language acquisition skills through spatially based learning activities in a VR simulation environment utilizing smartphones.

learning_goals: Learners can memorize target language words/sentences with 80% accuracy by location-based navigation in a 3D spatial simulation.
Learners can construct relational maps between language concepts with 90% accuracy using spatial mapping strategies.
Learners can apply situational language expressions with 75% fluency by performing role-plays in a VR environment.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
